AT.name: Mighty No. 9
AT.description: Du bist Beck, der 9. einer Reihe mächtiger Roboter und als einziger immun gegen einen Virus, der Mechs weltweit verrückt macht. Dich erwarten 12 Level mit Lauf-, Hüpf- und Kampfeinlagen. Nutze die Fähigkeiten besiegter Feinde, um die anderen Mighty Number-Roboter zu besiegen und stell dich dem Bösen, das die Welt in den Abgrund stürzen will! Features: Klassische 2-D-Action in neuem Gewand: Stell dich deinen 8 Mighty-Brüdern und schalte einzigartige Fähigkeiten frei, indem du sie besiegst. 2-Spieler-Mecha-Chaos: Spiele die Missionen online mit einem Freund als Beck und sein Partner, Call. Nutzt ihre Kräfte, um Hindernisse als Team zu überwinden, oder kämpft gegeneinander im Online-Rennkampf. Extra-Modi: Boss-Rush-Modus! Dutzende Mini-Missionen und Challenges! Optionaler 8-Bit-Soundtrack! 2 weitere Schwierigkeitsgrade zum Freischalten! Zeig der Welt, was du kannst: Kombiniere Becks Fähigkeiten für Kombopunkte, um begehrte S-Ränge, Bestpunktzahlen und Bestenlistenplätze zu erreichen!

AU.name: Mighty No. 9
AU.description: You play as Beck, the 9th in a line of powerful robots, and the only one immune to a mysterious virus that has caused mechanized creatures the world over to go berserk. Run, jump, blast, and transform your way through 12 challenging stages using abilities stolen from your enemies to take down your fellow Mighty Number robots and confront the final evil that threatens the planet! Features: Classic 2D Action Transformed: Face off against your 8 Mighty brethren & unlock transformations as you defeat them, granting unique skills! 2-Player Mechanical Mayhem: Take on missions online with a friend as Beck and his partner, Call; Use their unique powers to overcome obstacles as a team, or go head-to-head in an Online Race Battle! Extra Modes: Boss-rush Mode! Dozens of mini-missions & challenges! Toggleable 8-bit soundtrack! 2 unlockable extra difficulty modes! Show the world your might: Use Beck's skills to chain together combos & earn those sweet S-Ranks, highscores, & leaderboard rankings!

BG.name: Mighty No. 9

Features: Classic 2D Action Transformed: Face off against your 8 Mighty brethren & unlock transformations as you defeat them, granting unique skills! 2-Player Mechanical Mayhem: Take on missions online with a friend as Beck and his partner, Call; Use their unique powers to overcome obstacles as a team, or go head-to-head in an Online Race Battle! Extra Modes: Boss-rush Mode! Dozens of mini-missions & challenges! Toggleable 8-bit soundtrack! 2 unlockable extra difficulty modes! Show the world your might: Use Beck's skills to chain together combos & earn those sweet S-Ranks, highscores, & leaderboard rankings!

BE.name: Mighty No. 9
BE.description: Vous incarnez Beck, 9e d'une lignée de puissants robots et seul immunisé contre un mystérieux virus qui transforme les créatures mécanisées en machines de mort. Courez, sautez, tirez et transformez-vous à travers 12 niveaux retors, à l'aide de capacités volées à vos ennemis. Pourrez-vous vaincre les autres Mighty Numbers et le génie du mal qui menace la planète ? Caractéristiques : De l'action 2D classique... transformée ! Triomphez de vos 8 frères et sœurs pour débloquer des transformations aux compétences uniques ! Carnage mécanique à 2 joueurs : relevez des missions en ligne en incarnant Beck et son associée Call. Combinez leurs pouvoirs pour triompher ensemble ou affrontez-vous dans les courses-duels en ligne ! Modes bonus : un Boss Rush ! Des dizaines de mini-missions et défis ! Une bande-son 8 bits alternative ! 2 difficultés supplémentaires ! Prouvez vos talents : utilisez les compétences de Beck pour décrocher rangs S, high scores et places de choix dans les classements !

ES.name: Mighty No. 9
ES.description: En el juego, eres Beck, el 9º de una serie de potentes robots, y el único inmune a un virus que ha provocado que las criaturas mecánicas del mundo se vuelvan locas. Corre, salta, explota y transforma tu camino en 12 desafiantes niveles con habilidades arrebatadas al enemigo para reducir a los otros robots como tú, los Números Poderosos, y enfrentarte al mal que amenaza al planeta. Funciones: Accion clásica en 2D transformada: Enfréntate a tus 8 hermanos «Poderosos» y desbloquea transformaciones al vencerlos que te aportarán habilidades únicas. Caos mecánico para 2 jugadores: Completa misiones en línea con un amigo en la piel de Beck y Call. Usa sus poderes para superar obstáculos en equipo y participar mano a mano en la carrera online. Modos extra: ¡Modo de acometidas de jefes! ¡Minimisiones y desafíos! ¡Banda sonora de 8-bit activable! ¡2 modos de dificultad extra desbloqueables! Muestra lo que vales: ¡Usa las habilidades de Beck para encadenar combos y conquistar los marcadores!

IT.name: Mighty No. 9
IT.description: Gioca nei panni di Beck, numero 9 di una serie di potenti robot e unico immune a un virus che ha fatto impazzire le creature meccanizzate in tutto il mondo. Corri, salta, spara e trasformati per superare 12 appassionanti livelli con abilità sottratte ai nemici, abbatti tuoi compagni Mighty Number e affronta il male che minaccia il pianeta! Caratteristiche Classica azione 2D trasformata: sconfiggili i tuoi otto potenti fratelli e sblocca nuove trasformazioni con abilità uniche! Massacro meccanico a 2 giocatori: affronta missioni online con un amico nei panni di Beck e della compagna Call; superate gli ostacoli giocando di squadra con le loro abilità o sfidatevi in una Battaglia in corsa online! Modalità extra: modalità Boss Rush! Decine di mini-missioni e sfide! Colonna sonora alternativa a 8 bit! Due livelli di difficoltà extra sbloccabili! Mostra al mondo la tua potenza: usa le abilità di Beck per mettere a segno combo e guadagnare livelli S, record e posizioni in classifica!

NL.name: Mighty No. 9
NL.description: Je speelt als Beck, de 9e uit een reeks krachtige robots en de enige die immuun is voor een computervirus dat mechanische wezens overal ter wereld op tilt laat slaan. Ren, spring, knal en transformeer in 12 uitdagende levels, terwijl je de vaardigheden van je vijanden gebruikt om de andere Mighty Number-robots te verslaan en de ultieme bedreiging uit te schakelen! Kenmerken: Klassieke 2D-actie in een nieuwe vorm: versla de 8 andere Mighty-robots en krijg nieuwe transformaties met unieke krachten! Mechanisch geweld voor 2 spelers: speel samen met een vriend online als Beck en zijn partner Call; gebruik hun unieke krachten om obstakels uit de weg te ruimen, of neem het tegen elkaar op in een online race! Extra speltypes: Boss Rush-modus! Tientallen minimissies en uitdagingen! Optionele 8-bit soundtrack! 2 vrij te spelen moeilijkheidsgraden! Laat zien hoe machtig je bent: gebruik Becks vaardigheden om combo's aan elkaar te ketenen voor S-Ranks, topscores en een plaats in het klassement!

NZ.name: Mighty No. 9
NZ.description: You play as Beck, the 9th in a line of powerful robots, and the only one immune to a mysterious virus that has caused mechanized creatures the world over to go berserk. Run, jump, blast, and transform your way through 12 challenging stages using abilities stolen from your enemies to take down your fellow Mighty Number robots and confront the final evil that threatens the planet! Show the world your might: Use Beck's skills to chain together combos & earn those sweet S-Ranks, highscores, & leaderboard rankings!

PT.name: Mighty No. 9
PT.description: Joga como o Beck, o nono de uma linhagem de poderosos robôs, o único imune ao misterioso vírus que tem enlouquecido as criaturas mecânicas por todo o mundo. Corre, salta, explode, e transforma o teu caminho em 12 desafiadores níveis, usa habilidades roubadas aos inimigos para destruíres os teus colegas robôs Mighty Number e confronta o grande mal que ameaça o planeta! Características: Ação 2D clássica Transformada: Luta contra 8 irmãos Mighty e desbloqueia transformações ao derrotá-los e ganha habilidades únicas! Caos Mecânico de 2 jogadores: Faz missões online com um amigo como o Beck e o seu parceiro, Call; Usa os poderes únicos para superares obstáculos em equipa, ou compete numa Corrida Batalha Online! Modos Extra: Modo Boss-rush! Dúzias de mini-missões e desafios! Banda sonora de 8-bit! 2 modos de dificuldade extra desbloqueáveis! Mostra ao mundo o teu poder: Usa as habilidades do Beck para criar combos e conquistar os apetecíveis S-Ranks, pontuações e tabela de rankings!

RU.name: Mighty No. 9
RU.description: Вы играете за Бека, робота, не подверженного вирусу, превращающему машины в безумцев. Пройдите все 12 уровней, побеждайте роботов и сразитесь с великим злом! Особенности Классическая игра: побеждайте собратьев и разблокируйте уникальные умения! Играйте с другом: вместе или наперегонки! Дополнительные режимы: Схватка с боссом! Мини-задания и состязания! 8-битный звук! 2 суперсложных режима! Покажите им всем: создавайте комбинации и получайте ранги, ставьте рекорды и занимайте первые места!

SE.name: Mighty No. 9
SE.description: You play as Beck, the 9th in a line of powerful robots, and the only one immune to a mysterious virus that has caused mechanized creatures the world over to go berserk. Run, jump, blast, and transform your way through 12 challenging stages using abilities stolen from your enemies to take down your fellow Mighty Number robots and confront the final evil that threatens the planet! Features: Classic 2D Action Transformed: Face off against your 8 Mighty brethren & unlock transformations as you defeat them, granting unique skills! 2-Player Mechanical Mayhem: Take on missions online with a friend as Beck and his partner, Call; Use their unique powers to overcome obstacles as a team, or go head-to-head in an Online Race Battle! Extra Modes: Boss-rush Mode! Dozens of mini-missions & challenges! Toggleable 8-bit soundtrack! 2 unlockable extra difficulty modes! Show the world your might: Use Beck's skills to chain together combos & earn those sweet S-Ranks, highscores, & leaderboard rankings!
